name: power adapter production, for smartphone | power adapter, for smartphone | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/24815/documentation

This activity represents the production of on unit of power adapter, for smartphone with a weight of 0.0597kg . The data is composed of a weighted average between switched-mode chargers and linear external power supplies. It is assumed that switched-mode chargers take up 80% of the market. The dataset does not include a cable to connect a device. For the production volume the sum of the production volumes of smartphones and tablet were used.;Source: ;- V. Monier, S. Mudgal, L. Turunen, K. Schischke, C. Ciaglia, and N. F. Nissen, “Preparatory Studies for Eco-design Requirements of EuPs, Battery chargers and external power supplies, Final report,” 2007.

From reception of materials and auxiliares at the factory gate. 

The activity includes the materials, processes, tap water and energy use (included through processing datasets) for the production of one mobile phone external power supply. The dataset includes the exchange "used IT accessory" to take into account the disposal. Data on factory, accessoires and packaging are not included.
category: C:Manufacturing/27:Manufacture of electrical equipment/271:Manufacture of electric motors, generators, transformers and electricity distribution and control apparatus/2710:Manufacture of electric motors, generators, transformers and electricity di

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Data for composition are from 2007 but represent current technology.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Geography GLO was chosen because the dataset aims to represent the production of an average electronic device.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Production efforts for the processing of steel (sheet rolling), plastics (injection moulding), metals (metal working, average for copper product manufacturing) and the soldering of components to the printed wiring board (mounting, surface mount technology, Pb-free solder), water and energy use are included.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The dataset represents a weighted average between four different power adapter. 80% of the data is composed of three switched-mode chargers, each representing 26.7% of the data. The remaining 20% is composed of one linear power supply.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Information on the included materials are obtained through the bill of materials directly from manufacturers or through dismantling and weighing of the components.
